department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada requires two (2) 600V 1200A automatic transfer switches for the electrical systems at the Canada Centre of Inland Waters.
tags: Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
----------------------------------
Automatic Transfer Switch Procurement
KW405-230410

**Solicitation Number**
-------------------------
WS3693732964

**Tender Details**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC), is issuing a request for proposal for the procurement of two (2) 600V 1200A automatic transfer switches for the electrical systems at the Canada Centre of Inland Waters.

**Key Dates**
------------

* Publication Date: February 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: April 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: March 30, 2023

**Solicitation Information**
----------------------------

* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: The contracting authority welcomes bids from suppliers who are certified under the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* Regions of Opportunity: The procurement opportunity is open to all eligible suppliers in Canada, with specific delivery constraints to Ontario.
* Contact Information:
  * Christopher Casale - Spokesperson, PSPC/SPAC
  * Email: [christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: (343) 575-5249

**Notice and Attachment**
-------------------------

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website ([http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15343487?extsite=MTUzNDM0ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15343487?extsite=MTUzNDM0ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)) for the full solicitation, including tender description, evaluation criteria, and other relevant documents.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------
